		<div id="hometext">
<h1 class="webfont">Welcome to Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage</h1>
<p>At <a href="http://www.nutsauto.com/about-us.aspx">Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage</a>, we have serviced the automotive repair needs of those in the Savannah, GA area since we opened our doors in 1993. Our full-service <a href="http://www.nutsauto.com/auto-repairs.aspx">auto repair</a> facility is located at 34 Echols Ave. in Savannah, GA, where we offer many high quality automotive repair services including <a href="http://www.nutsauto.com/auto-repairs/hybrid-service.aspx">hybrid services</a> to customers in the area. Our ASA- and ASE-certified mechanics are trained to accurately diagnose automotive issues the first time and make speedy repairs to get you back out on the road. Open Monday through Friday from 8:00 AM &ndash; 5:00 PM, we serve customers from Savannah, GA, Pooler, GA, Hilton Head Island, SC, and other surrounding areas. Feel free to come into Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage for a quote on an automotive repair service, or you can schedule an appointment with us online today. Call us if you need towing or roadside service. We offer after-hours drop-off and free shuttle service. Or, you can take advantage of free Wi-Fi while you wait. At Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage, we always bust our nuts.</p>
</div>

	<div id="dnn_ctr4741_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
	<p>Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage is a pillar of the Savannah, GA community. <a href="http://www.nutsauto.com/">Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage</a>  is a leader in offering auto repair  services for customers located in and around the Savannah, Georgia  area. Our goal is to focus on customer service. It is the foundation of  our business. Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage employs well-trained mechanics specializing in complete under car  services for both foreign and domestic vehicles. All of our auto repair services are  readily available at competitive prices. Take this opportunity to browse the  Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage website or call us for personalized service.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.nutsauto.com/location.aspx">Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage Location</a>:</p>
<p><strong>Savannah, GA</strong> &ndash; Looking for an auto repair shop in  Savannah, GA then Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage has the right auto repair services for your car or truck. Our  Savannah, Georgia location offers many <a href="http://www.nutsauto.com/tire-brands.aspx">Savannah, GA auto repairs</a>  that are affordable and other Savannah, GA mechanic services for  your car. Give our Savannah, GA location a call at <strong>(912) 233-6023</strong> today to schedule an appointment.</p>
<p>Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage located at 34 Echols Avenue, Savannah, GA 31406 provides quality automotive products  and services to customers in Savannah, GA, Pooler, GA, and  Hilton Head Island, SC.  Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage is the leading auto repair shop in Savannah, GA. Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage also offers services in Auto Repair, Hybrid Car Repairs and Hybrid Battery Repairs. Give  Two Nuts And A Bolt Garage a call at (912) 233-6023 to schedule an appointment today!</p>
